Uses of Package
ddf.catalog.validation

  • Packages that use ddf.catalog.validation 
    Package Description
    ddf.catalog.metacard.validation  
    ddf.catalog.validation
    Provides the classes for the Catalog Validation API and implementation.
    ddf.catalog.validation.impl
    Provides the classes for the Catalog Validation API and implementation.

  • Classes in ddf.catalog.validation used by ddf.catalog.metacard.validation 
    Class and Description
    MetacardValidator
    A service that validates a Metacard and provides information if problems exist with the Metacard data.
  • Classes in ddf.catalog.validation used by ddf.catalog.validation 
    Class and Description
    AttributeValidator
    A service that validates a single Metacard attribute and provides information if problems exist with the attribute's value.
    ValidationException
    Thrown to indicate that a validation operation could not be completed.
  • Classes in ddf.catalog.validation used by ddf.catalog.validation.impl 
    Class and Description
    AttributeValidator
    A service that validates a single Metacard attribute and provides information if problems exist with the attribute's value.
    AttributeValidatorRegistry
    Manages registered attribute validators.
    MetacardValidator
    A service that validates a Metacard and provides information if problems exist with the Metacard data.
    ReportingMetacardValidator
    Validates a Metacard and provides information via a report if problems exist with the Metacard's data.
    ValidationException
    Thrown to indicate that a validation operation could not be completed.
